message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our flagship product, which we believe is worth every bit of its $1200000 value to you. Given your discerning taste and the importance of this product to your endeavors, I am extending an exclusive offer to acquire it at a special price of $1080000. This represents a significant saving of $120000 compared to the standard retail price, making it an exceptional opportunity for you to secure such a valuable asset at a highly favorable rate. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or proceed with the purchase.
